sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <v-color-picker v-model="selectedColor" hide-canvas />
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <v-card :color="selectedColor">
          <v-card-title class="text-center">
            {{ selectedColorLabel }}
          </v-card-title>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      selectedColor: "#FF0000",
      colorLabels: {
        "#FF0000": "赤",
        "#00FF00": "緑",
        "#0000FF": "青"
      }
    }
  },
  computed: {
    selectedColorLabel() {
      return this.colorLabels[this.selectedColor] || "";
    }
  }
}
</script>
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <v-color-picker v-model="selectedColor" hide-canvas />
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <v-card :color="selectedColor">
          <v-card-title class="text-center">
            {{ selectedColorLabel }}
          </v-card-title>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      selectedColor: "#FF0000",
      colorLabels: {
        "#FF0000": "赤",
        "#00FF00": "緑",
        "#0000FF": "青"
      }
    }
  },
  computed: {
    selectedColorLabel() {

          <v-card-title class="text-center">
            {{ selectedColorLabel }}
          </v-card-title>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>

  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {

        "#00FF00": "緑",
        "#0000FF": "青"
      }
    }
  },
  computed: {
    selectedColorLabel() {
      return this.colorLabels[this.selectedColor] || "";
    }
  }
}
</script>
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <v-color-picker v-model="selectedColor" hide-canvas />
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <v-card :color="selectedColor">
          <v-card-title class="text-center">
            {{ selectedColorLabel }}
          </v-card-title>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      selectedColor: "#FF0000",
      colorLabels: {
        "#FF0000": "赤",
        "#00FF00": "緑",
        "#0000FF": "青"
      }
    }
  },
  computed: {
    selectedColorLabel() {
      return this.colorLabels[this.selectedColor] || "";
    }
  }
}
</script>
